steps: Go to the create your account page
Input your username. Username could be an email or a set of characters that you can remember.

Create a secure password. The password should contain: 
 - 1 or more capital letter.
 - Length of 8.
 - Digits 0-9.
Additionally input information: Age, Location, Gender.
Click `Sign In.`
Finally, you are able to fully use the platform.
Click on 'Log In' button.
You will get redirected into another page where you should input you name and username/email.
Log in to the platform using your credentials.
Navigate to your Account page.
Change the information you want.
Verify if the new info is correct.
Submit the changes.
Log in to the platform using your credentials.
Navigate to `Game Library` page.
Pick one from a vast selection of board games.
Click on the desired game.

On the game information page press `Play`. You will be granted with a choice of playing a game:
 - With a random player.
 - With your friend.
(Option 1): If you picked playing with a random player, you will be joined in a lobby and the game will start soon.

(Option 2): If you picked playing with a friend, you will be joined in a lobby and you will be provided with a list of your friends.
 Send an invitation to a friend with whom you wish to play.
 When a friend accepts your invitation, he will be joined into your lobby and the game will soon start.
You and your opponent will be redirected to a game page.
Enjoy your game!

On the game information page press `Play`. You will be granted with a choice of playing a game:

Log in to the platform using your credentials.
Navigate to `Game Library` page.
Use search bar to find your desired board game.
Enjoy your game!
Log in to the platform using your credentials.
Navigate to `Game Library` page.
Pick one from a vast selection of board games.
Click on the desired game.
On the game description page click on 'Mark as favourites'.
Later, you can filter board games by favourites and the games that you have marked should be on the list.
Log in to the platform using your credentials.
If a friend has already invited you in the game you will receive a notification.
Decline or accept this invitation.
If you accepted the invitation, you will be redirected in to a lobby with your friend and the game will soon start.
Log in to the platform using your credentials.
Go to `My Account` page.
Scroll to `My Friends` section.
There you will find `Connect with your Friends` search bar.
Type username of your friend in the search bar.
In the results section click on the username of your friend and click 'Send invitation'.
If a person accepts your request, he will appear in the list of your friends.
You must be logged-in.
Go to `My Account` page.
Scroll to `My Friends` section.
There you will find `Friend requests` list.
Click on the request.
Accept or decline a request from the sender.
Log in to the platform using your credentials.
Navigate to `Game Library` page.
Pick a game which achievements you want to see.
On the game description page scroll down to `Achievements` section.
There you will find all the achievements of the game and their statuses (Locked, Unlocked).
Log in to the platform using your credentials.
Navigate to `Game Library` page.
Pick a game which achievements you want to unlock.
On the game description page scroll down to `Achievements` section.
Find the achievement you want to unlock, there you will find the criteria you have to fulfill in order to unlock it.
If the criteria description is longer, click on `More info` button for more information.
Log in to the platform using your credentials.
Navigate to `Game Library` page.
Pick a game which achievements you want to unlock.
On the game description page scroll down to `Achievements` section.
There you will find all the achievements of the game and their statuses (Locked, Unlocked).
In order to unlock achievemnts, you have to complete the criteria whilst playing the required game.
After successfully completing an achievement, it's status will change to `Unlocked`.
Happy achievement hunting!
Log in to the platform using your credentials.
Go to `My Account` page.
There you will find `My statistics` section. It will provide general information about your playing history on the platform.
